text: وَقَالُوا۟ قُلُوبُنَا فِىٓ أَكِنَّةٍ مِّمَّا تَدْعُونَآ إِلَيْهِ وَفِىٓ ءَاذَانِنَا وَقْرٌ وَمِنۢ بَيْنِنَا وَبَيْنِكَ حِجَابٌ فَٱعْمَلْ إِنَّنَا عَـٰمِلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And they say, "Our hearts are within coverings from that to which you invite us, and in our ears is deafness, and between us and you is a partition, so work; indeed, we are working."
translation.id.indonesian: Mereka berkata: "Hati kami berada dalam tutupan (yang menutupi) apa yang kamu seru kami kepadanya dan telinga kami ada sumbatan dan antara kami dan kamu ada dinding, maka bekerjalah kamu; sesungguhnya kami bekerja (pula)".
